thread.title: Dodgers' Utley has appeal hearing for takeout slide postponed
thread.title_full: Dodgers' Utley has appeal hearing for takeout slide postponed

title: Dodgers' Utley has appeal hearing for takeout slide postponed
text: Dodgers' Utley has appeal hearing for takeout slide postponed Saturday, 17 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) With no urgency remaining following the Los Angeles Dodgers' elimination from the postseason, Major League Baseball and the players' association postponed Chase Utley 's appeal hearing. A person familiar with the process says Chase Utley's appeal hearing for his two-game postseason suspension is unlikely to be scheduled for Monday, which means the Los Angeles Dodgers second baseman could be eligible to play (Oct. 12) Recent related news *By The Canadian Press* NEW YORK — Los Angeles Dodgers second baseman Chase Utley was suspended two playoff games by Major League Baseball on Sunday night... CJME 6 days ago - World Also reported by • philly.com • WTHR • USATODAY.com You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
